column1: he transcript highlights the strong performance of the brand across all channels, particularly in direct-to-consumer channels. The brand's success is attributed to its ability to communicate aspirational upbeat brand messages through beautiful inventory, differentiated products and exceptional customer experiences. The company is investing heavily in improving the customer experience, with enhancements to its mobile apps, search engine optimization, customer data and insights, customer service and much more. The boundaries between retail and e-commerce businesses are becoming increasingly blurry, and the company is determined to fulfill the desire of its customers to mix and match digital and physical elements at will. The company's total e-commerce business is expected to be roughly a third of consolidated sales, compared to 23% in fiscal 2019. The company has a strong balance sheet and strong cash flow from operations. The outlook for the back half of the year reflects the company's expectation of strength in its full price direct-to-consumer business. The company expects full price direct-to-consumer sales growth and consolidated gross margin expansion over 2019. However, the company expects sales from Lanier Apparel to be approximately $25
